content: @Nikita Popov is https://reviews.llvm.org/D109257 / https://groups.google.com/g/llvm-dev/c/sJReLGii4cg?pli=1 relevant to our attempts to enable newpm by default?
Generally yes in that it could affect us, though not through the reported pathway (we don't enable loop distribute).
There's probably no need to go out of the way to backport this ahead of time, can merge from release/13.x once it's on there.
This patch is merged as part of https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/88765.
